00043     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044     PagingLandScapeTextureManager::PagingLandScapeTextureManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr) :
00045         mSceneManager(scnMgr),
00046         mOptions (scnMgr->getOptions()),
00047         mTextureType (0),
00048         mTextureFormat (""),
00049         mWidth (0),
00050         mHeight (0),
00051         mTexturePageSize (mOptions->PageSize -1),
00052         mPaintChannel(0),
00053         mPaintColor(ColourValue::White)
00054         {    
00055     }
00056         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057         void    PagingLandScapeTextureManager::registerTextureFormats()
00058         { 
00059                 const std::vector<String> TextureFormatSupported = mOptions->TextureFormatSupported;
00060 
00061                 // for all terrain configuration file texture format not in mTextureTypeMap allocate
00062                 {
00063                         std::vector<String>::const_iterator itTexFormatSupp = TextureFormatSupported.begin();
00064                         while (itTexFormatSupp != TextureFormatSupported.end())
00065                         {
00066                                 const String &textureFormat = (*itTexFormatSupp);
00067                                 if (!textureFormat.empty ())
00068                                 {
00069                                         PagingLandScapeTextureMap::iterator iTexFormatCurr = mTextureTypeMap.begin();
00070                                         while (iTexFormatCurr != mTextureTypeMap.end())
00071                                         {
00072                                                 if ((*iTexFormatCurr)->getName () == textureFormat)
00073                                                         break;
00074                                                 ++iTexFormatCurr;
00075                                         }
00076                                         if (iTexFormatCurr == mTextureTypeMap.end())
00077                                                 registerTextureType(new PagingLandScapeTexture(this, textureFormat));
00078                                 }
00079                                 ++itTexFormatSupp;
00080                         }
00081                 }
00082 
00083 
00084                 // for all mTextureTypeMap[i] not in terrain configuration file, delete
00085                 {
00086                         PagingLandScapeTextureMap::iterator iTexFormatCurr = mTextureTypeMap.begin();
00087                         while (iTexFormatCurr != mTextureTypeMap.end())
00088                         {
00089                                 const String &textureFormat = (*iTexFormatCurr)->getName ();
00090 
00091                                 if (TextureFormatSupported.end() == std::find(TextureFormatSupported.begin(), 
00092                                                                                                         TextureFormatSupported.end(), 
00093                                                                                                         textureFormat))
00094                                 {
00095                                         delete (*iTexFormatCurr);
00096                                         iTexFormatCurr = mTextureTypeMap.erase (iTexFormatCurr);
00097                                 }
00098                                 else
00099                                 {
00100                                         ++iTexFormatCurr;
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104 
00105 
00106                 // Add default texture Types.
00107                 // dynamically create maps.
00108                 //registerTextureType (new PagingLandScapeTexture_BaseTexture(this));
00109                 //registerTextureType (new PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting(this));
00110         }
00111 
00112         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00113         void    PagingLandScapeTextureManager::clearTextureFormats()
00114         {
00115                 // for all in map delete.
00116                 PagingLandScapeTextureMap::iterator i = mTextureTypeMap.begin();
00117                 while (i != mTextureTypeMap.end())
00118                 {
00119                         delete (*i);
00120                         ++i;
00121                 }
00122         }
00123     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00124     String PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getNextTextureFormat()
00125     {
00126         assert (!mTextureTypeMap.empty());
00127         const size_t numTextureTypes = mTextureTypeMap.size();
00128         unsigned int nextTextureType =  mTextureType + 1;
00129         if (nextTextureType == numTextureTypes)
00130             nextTextureType = 0;
00131         unsigned int numLoop = 0;
00132         // find Next supported texture format.
00133         while (numLoop != numTextureTypes)
00134         { 
00135 #ifdef _DEBUG
00136             std::cout << "Trying " << mTextureTypeMap[nextTextureType]->getName () << '\n';
00137 #endif //_DEBUG
00138             if (mTextureTypeMap[nextTextureType]->isMaterialSupported())
00139             {
00140                 return mTextureTypeMap[nextTextureType]->getName();
00141             }
00142 
00143             nextTextureType ++ ;
00144             if (nextTextureType == numTextureTypes)
00145                 nextTextureType = 0;
00146             numLoop++;
00147             
00148         }
00149         assert (numLoop == numTextureTypes);
00150         
00151         OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00152             "Cannot find a TextureMode  supported by current hardware!  (shaders/num texture units...)",
00153             " getNextTextureFormat ");           
00154         
00155         return StringUtil::BLANK;
00156         }
00157         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00158         void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::setPageSize ()
00159         {
00160                 PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mOptions;
00161                 mPageSize = opt->PageSize - 1;
00162                 Real Texturescale = opt->TextureStretchFactor;
00163                 const unsigned int textureSize = (unsigned int) (mPageSize * Texturescale);
00164                 uchar *data = new uchar[textureSize * textureSize * 3];
00165                 mImage.loadDynamicImage (data, textureSize, textureSize, PF_BYTE_RGB);
00166 
00167                 const unsigned int numColors = opt->NumMatHeightSplat;
00168 
00169                 unsigned int i;
00170                 colors.reserve (numColors);
00171                 colors.resize (numColors);
00172                 for (i = 0; i < numColors; i++)
00173                 {
00174                         colors[i] = opt->matColor[i];
00175                 }
00176                 heights.reserve (numColors);
00177                 heights.resize (numColors);
00178                 for (i = 0; i < numColors; i++)
00179                 {
00180                         heights[i] = opt->matHeight[i];
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 //  slope[] ??
00184 
00185                 if (numColors  && heights[numColors - 1] == 0.0f) 
00186                         heights[numColors - 1] = getSceneManager()->getData2DManager()->getMaxHeight ();
00187 
00188                 dividers.reserve (numColors);
00189                 dividers.resize (numColors);
00190                 if (numColors)
00191                 {
00192                         dividers[0] = 1.0f;
00193 
00194                         for (i = 1; i < numColors; i++) 
00195                         {   
00196                                 if ((heights[i]  - heights[i - 1])  > 0)
00197                                         dividers[i] = 1 / (heights[i]  - heights[i - 1]);
00198                                 else 
00199                                         dividers[i] = 0.0f;
00200                         }               
00201                 }
00202 
00203         }
00204         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00205         void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::clearData ()
00206         {
00207                 delete [] mImage.getData ();    
00208                 mImage.loadDynamicImage (0, 0, 0, PF_BYTE_RGB);    
00209         }
00210     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00211     String PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getCurrentTextureFormat()
00212     {
00213         assert (!mTextureTypeMap.empty());
00214         return mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->getName();;
00215     }
00216     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00217     PagingLandScapeTextureManager::~PagingLandScapeTextureManager()
00218         {
00219                 reset ();
00220                 clearTextureFormats ();
00221     }   
00222     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::reset()
00224         {
00225                 if (!mActiveTextures.empty())
00226                 {
00227                         std::for_each (mActiveTextures.begin(), mActiveTextures.end(), 
00228                                 std::mem_fun (&PagingLandScapeTexture::unload));
00229 
00230                         // Insert actives into free list
00231                         mFreeTextures.insert (mFreeTextures.end(), mActiveTextures.begin(), mActiveTextures.end());
00232                         // Remove all active instances
00233                         mActiveTextures.clear(); 
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 // could save a delete if texture type is the same... ?
00237                 if (!mTexturePool.empty())
00238                 {
00239                         std::for_each(mTexturePool.begin(), mTexturePool.end(), delete_object());
00240                         mTexturePool.clear();
00241                         mFreeTextures.clear();
00242                 }
00243        mWidth = 0; 
00244            mHeight = 0;
00245         }  
00246         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00247         PagingLandScapeTexture *PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getNewTexture(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00248         {
00249                 PagingLandScapeTexture *newTexture;
00250                 if (mFreeTextures.empty())
00251                 {
00252                         const size_t pool_size = mTexturePool.size ();                  
00253                         const size_t new_pool_size = (pool_size == 0)  ? 9 : pool_size * 2;
00254                         mTexturePool.reserve(new_pool_size);
00255                         mTexturePool.resize(new_pool_size);
00256 
00257                         // Create new pages
00258                         for (size_t i = pool_size; i < new_pool_size; ++i)
00259                         {
00260                                 newTexture = allocateTexture();
00261                                 mTexturePool[i] = newTexture;
00262                                 mFreeTextures.push_back (newTexture);
00263                         }
00264                 }
00265 
00266                 newTexture = mFreeTextures.front ();
00267                 mFreeTextures.pop_front ();
00268                 mActiveTextures.push_back (newTexture); 
00269 
00270                 newTexture->load(x, z);
00271 
00272                 return newTexture;
00273         }
00274         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00275         void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::releaseTexture(PagingLandScapeTexture *p)
00276         {
00277                 mActiveTextures.remove (p);
00278                 mFreeTextures.push_back (p);
00279         }
00280         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00281         PagingLandScapeTexture *PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getTexture(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z,
00282                 const bool alwaysReturn)
00283         {
00284                 if (x < mWidth && z < mHeight)
00285                 {
00286                         PagingLandScapeTextureList::iterator l, lend = mActiveTextures.end();
00287                         for (l = mActiveTextures.begin(); l != lend; ++l)
00288                         {
00289                                 if ((*l)->isCoord(x, z))
00290                                         return (*l);
00291                         }
00292                         if (alwaysReturn)
00293                                 return getNewTexture(x, z);
00294                 }
00295                 assert (!alwaysReturn);
00296                 return 0;
00297         }
00298     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00299     PagingLandScapeTexture *PagingLandScapeTextureManager::allocateTexture() const
00300     {
00301        return mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->newTexture();
00302     }
00303     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00304     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::load ()
00305     {        
00306                 registerTextureFormats ();
00307         if (mOptions->textureFormat != mTextureFormat)
00308         {
00309             reset ();
00310             mTextureFormat = mOptions->textureFormat; 
00311             unsigned int i = 0;
00312             assert (!mTextureTypeMap.empty());
00313             const size_t numTextureTypes = mTextureTypeMap.size();
00314             for (; i != numTextureTypes; ++i)
00315             {
00316                 const String &modeName = mTextureTypeMap[i]->getName ();
00317                 if (modeName == mTextureFormat)
00318                 {
00319                                         if (!mTextureTypeMap[i]->isMaterialSupported())
00320                                         {
00321                                                 mTextureFormat = getNextTextureFormat();// not supported, find first supported.
00322                                                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k != numTextureTypes; ++k)
00323                                                 {
00324                                                         const String &newmodeName = mTextureTypeMap[k]->getName ();
00325                                                         if (newmodeName == mTextureFormat)
00326                                                         {
00327                                                                 mTextureType = k;
00328                                                                 i = k;
00329                                                                 break;
00330                                                         }
00331                                                 }
00332                                         }
00333                                         else
00334                                         {
00335                                                 mTextureType = i;
00336                                         }
00337                     break;
00338                 }
00339             }
00340             if (i == numTextureTypes)
00341             {
00342                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00343                         "TextureMode not supplied or wrong (check case) !",
00344                                 " PagingLandScapeTextureManager::load ");
00345             }
00346             if (!mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->isMaterialSupported())
00347             {
00348                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00349                         "TextureMode not supported by current hardware!  (shaders/num texture units...)",
00350                                 " PagingLandScapeTextureManager::load ");
00351             }
00352             mTexturePageSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00353         }
00354         setPageSize();      
00355                 mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->setOptions();
00356         WorldDimensionChange();
00357     }
00358 
00359         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00360         unsigned int PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getNumChannels()
00361         { 
00362                 return mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->getNumChannels ();
00363         }

00367         return mTextureTypeMap[mTextureType]->getNumChannelsperTexture (i);
00368     }
00369     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00371     {
00372        // member de-init. 
00373        clearData();
00374        mMapMaterial.setNull();
00375     }
00376     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00377     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::WorldDimensionChange()
00378     {
00379         const unsigned int newWidth = mOptions->world_width; 
00380         const unsigned int newHeight = mOptions->world_height;    
00381 
00382                 reset();
00383 
00384         mWidth = newWidth; 
00385         mHeight = newHeight;  
00386     }
00387     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00388     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::setMapMaterial()
00389     {
00390         PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mOptions;
00391         const String mapName =  String("Small") + opt->image_filename;
00392         mMapMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName (mapName);
00393         if (mMapMaterial.isNull())
00394         {
00395             MaterialPtr matTemplate = MaterialManager::getSingleton().
00396                             getByName (String ("PagingLandScape.Small.Template"));
00397             mMapMaterial = matTemplate ->clone (mapName);
00398             const String texname(opt->image_filename + ".Small." + 
00399                                 opt->TextureExtension);
00400                 mMapMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->
00401                                 getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureName (texname);
00402             mMapMaterial->load();
00403         }
00404       } 
00405     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00406     MaterialPtr PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getMapMaterial()
00407     {
00408         return mMapMaterial;
00409     }
00410     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00411     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::load(const unsigned int texX, const unsigned int texZ)
00412     {
00413             PagingLandScapeTexture* tex = getTexture (texX , texZ);
00414             if (!tex->isLoaded ())
00415         {
00416                     tex->load (texX, texZ);
00417             }
00418     }   
00419     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00420     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::unload(const unsigned int texX, const unsigned int texZ)
00421     {
00422             PagingLandScapeTexture* tex = getTexture (texX , texZ, false);
00423             if (tex && tex->isLoaded ())
00424             {
00425                     tex->unload ();
00426                         releaseTexture (tex);
00427             }
00428     }
00429     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00430     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::reload(const unsigned int texX, const unsigned int texZ)
00431     {
00432         PagingLandScapeTexture* tex = getTexture (texX , texZ);
00433             tex->unload();
00434             tex->load(texX, texZ);
00435         const unsigned int tsize =  mOptions->TileSize;
00436         const unsigned int psize =  mOptions->PageSize;
00437         for (unsigned int z = 0; z <= psize ; z += tsize)
00438         {
00439             for (unsigned int x = 0; x <= psize ; x += tsize)
00440             {                       
00441                     tex->adjustDeformationRectangle (x, z);
00442             }
00443         }
00444     }
00445     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00446     bool PagingLandScapeTextureManager::isLoaded(const unsigned int texX, const unsigned int texZ)
00447     {
00448                 const PagingLandScapeTexture * const tex = getTexture (texX , texZ, false);
00449             return tex && tex->isLoaded();
00450     }
00451     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00452     const MaterialPtr&  PagingLandScapeTextureManager::getMaterial(const unsigned int texX, const unsigned int texZ)
00453         {
00454                 PagingLandScapeTexture * const tex = getTexture (texX , texZ, false);
00455                 assert (tex);
00456                 return tex->getMaterial();
00457     }
00458     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00459     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::paint (const Vector3 &currpoint, 
00460                                                                                                 const Real paintForce, 
00461                                                                                                 const PagingLandScapeTileInfo *info)
00462     {
00463                 const unsigned int pX = info->mPageX;
00464                 const unsigned int pZ = info->mPageZ;
00465         const unsigned int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00466         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00467         const unsigned int x = static_cast<unsigned int> (currpoint.x
00468                                             - pX * pSize
00469                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledX);
00470         const unsigned int z = static_cast<unsigned int> (currpoint.z
00471                                             - pZ * pSize
00472                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ);
00473 
00474         PagingLandScapeTexture* tex = getTexture (pX , pZ, false);
00475         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00476         {
00477             const unsigned int tSize = pSize - 1;
00478             const bool rightlimit = (x >= tSize);
00479             const bool uplimit    = (z >= tSize);
00480 
00481             // If we're not on a page edge
00482             if (!rightlimit && !uplimit)
00483             {
00484                                 tex->paint (x, z, paintForce);
00485             }
00486 
00487             // we must duplicate the change on the 
00488             // neighbor page (if it has one...)    
00489             const unsigned int wL = mOptions->world_width;
00490             const unsigned int hL = mOptions->world_height;
00491             const bool right = false;//(rightlimit && pX < wL - 1);
00492             const bool up    = false;//(uplimit    && pZ < hL - 1);
00493             const bool left  = (x == 0     && pX != 0);
00494             const bool down  = (z == 0     && pZ != 0);
00495 
00496             assert (z <= tSize && x <= tSize);
00497 
00498             if (left)
00499             {
00500                 if (down)
00501                 {               
00502                     //  lower left corner 
00503                     tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ - 1, false);
00504                     if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00505                                         {
00506                                                 tex->paint (tSize, tSize, paintForce);
00507                     } 
00508                 }
00509                 else if (up)
00510                 {
00511                                         //  upper left corner 
00512                                         tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ + 1, false);
00513                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00514                                         {
00515                                                 tex->paint (tSize, 0, paintForce);
00516                     } 
00517                 } 
00518                 else
00519                 {
00520                                         // left only 
00521                                         tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ, false);
00522                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00523                                         {
00524                                                 tex->paint (tSize, z, paintForce);
00525                     } 
00526                 }
00527             }
00528             else if (right)
00529             {
00530                 if (up)
00531                 {
00532                                         //  upper right corner 
00533                                         tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ + 1, false);
00534                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00535                                         {
00536                                                 tex->paint (0, 0, paintForce);
00537                     } 
00538                 }
00539                 else if (down)
00540                 {
00541                                         //  lower right corner 
00542                                         tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ - 1, false);
00543                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00544                                         {
00545                                                 tex->paint (0, tSize, paintForce);
00546                     } 
00547                 }  
00548                 else
00549                 {
00550                                         // right only
00551                                         tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ, false);
00552                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00553                                         {
00554                                                 tex->paint (0, z, paintForce);
00555                     } // if (tex->isLoaded())   
00556                 }
00557             }
00558             else if (down)
00559             {        
00560                                 //  lower  (down only)    
00561                                 tex = getTexture (pX, pZ - 1, false);
00562                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00563                                 {
00564                                         tex->paint (x, tSize, paintForce);
00565                 } 
00566             }
00567             else if (up)
00568             {
00569                                 // upper (up only)
00570                                 tex = getTexture (pX, pZ + 1, false);
00571                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00572                                 {
00573                                         tex->paint (x, 0, paintForce);
00574                 } 
00575             }     
00576         }
00577     }
00578     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00579     void PagingLandScapeTextureManager::deformHeight (const Vector3 &currpoint,
00580         const PagingLandScapeTileInfo *info)
00581     {
00582         const unsigned int pX = info->mPageX;
00583         const unsigned int pZ = info->mPageZ;
00584         const unsigned int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00585         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00586         const unsigned int x = static_cast<unsigned int> (currpoint.x
00587                                             - pX * pSize
00588                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledX);
00589         const unsigned int z = static_cast<unsigned int> (currpoint.z
00590                                             - pZ * pSize
00591                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ);
00592 
00593                 PagingLandScapeTexture* tex = getTexture (pX , pZ, false);
00594                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00595         {
00596             const unsigned int tSize = pSize - 1;
00597             const bool rightlimit = (x >= tSize);
00598             const bool uplimit    = (z >= tSize);
00599 
00600             // If we're on a page edge
00601             if (!(rightlimit && uplimit))
00602             {
00603                 tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(x, z); 
00604             }
00605 
00606             // we must duplicate the change on the 
00607             // neighbour page (if it has one...)    
00608             const unsigned int wL = mOptions->world_width;
00609             const unsigned int hL = mOptions->world_height;
00610             const bool right = false;//(rightlimit && pX < wL - 1);
00611             const bool up    = false;//(uplimit    && pZ < hL - 1);
00612             const bool left  = (x == 0     && pX != 0);
00613             const bool down  = (z == 0     && pZ != 0);
00614 
00615             assert (z <= tSize && x <= tSize);
00616 
00617             if (left)
00618             {
00619                 if (down)
00620                 {               
00621                                         //  lower left corner 
00622                                         tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ - 1, false);
00623                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00624                     {
00625                         tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(tSize, tSize); 
00626                     } 
00627                 }
00628                 else if (up)
00629                 {
00630                                         //  upper left corner 
00631                                         tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ + 1, false);
00632                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00633                     {
00634                         tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(tSize, 0); 
00635                     } 
00636                 } 
00637                                 // left
00638                                 tex = getTexture (pX - 1 , pZ, false);
00639                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00640                 {
00641                     tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(tSize, z); 
00642                 } 
00643             }
00644             else if (right)
00645             {
00646                 if (up)
00647                 {
00648                                         //  upper right corner 
00649                                         tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ + 1, false);
00650                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00651                     {
00652                         tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(0, 0); 
00653                     } 
00654                 }
00655                 else if (down)
00656                 {
00657                                         //  lower right corner 
00658                                         tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ - 1, false);
00659                                         if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00660                     {
00661                         tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(0, tSize); 
00662                     } 
00663                 }  
00664                                 // right only
00665                                 tex = getTexture (pX + 1 , pZ, false);
00666                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00667                 {
00668                     tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(0, z); 
00669                 } 
00670             }
00671             if (down)
00672             {        
00673                                 //  lower  (down only)    
00674                                 tex = getTexture (pX, pZ - 1, false);
00675                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00676                 {
00677                     tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(x, tSize); 
00678                 } 
00679             }
00680             else if (up)
00681             {
00682                                 // upper (up only)
00683                                 tex = getTexture (pX, pZ + 1, false);
00684                                 if (tex && tex->isLoaded())
00685                 {
00686                     tex->adjustDeformationRectangle(x, 0); 
00687                 } 
00688             }     
00689         } // if (tex->isLoaded())          
00690     } 
00691 } //namespace
